features: Skill Level:Intermediate; - Sales professionals looking to streamline their tasks and data management.; - Sales managers wanting to optimize team workflows.; - Sales teams aiming to improve collaboration and efficiency.; Basic understanding of Notion features; - Familiarity with sales processes; - Basic knowledge of data management; - Navigating the Notion Universe
